title: Foreign exchange earnings from tourism in India 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars, about 17.74 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Foreign exchange earnings in billion U.S. dollars, of value 7.49 was reported at Year 2005
